CustomField.description: This formula field is used in Personnal request approval process to identify the 6th and 7th approvers to skip the duplicate approval email.
CustomField.formula:
AND( NOT(ISBLANK(Role06__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(Role07__c)), Role06__c="zuständiger BV", Role07__c ="Geschäftsführer", NOT(ISBLANK(Approver6__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(Approver7__c)), Approver6__r.Username ="peter.sokol@seg-automotive.com", Approver7__r.Username ="peter.sokol@seg-automotive.com"
)
CustomField.label: Is Same Approver 6 And 7?
